document_data.name: City Guard of Ordulin
document_data.mainbody: The '''City Guard''' of [[Ordulin]] served as the main line of defense and police force for the city.
document_data.Organization: Captain [[Raithspur]] was the leader of the city guard in the {{YearlinkName|1358}}. He commanded 2,000 guardsmen. Guardsmen were armed with variety of weaponry including [[halberd]]s, [[mace]]s, [[long sword]]s, and [[dagger]]s. All guardsmen wore [[plate mail]].
document_data.Activities: The city guard occasionally served as the standing army for the city, but they mainly policed the streets.
